Thursday, November 19, 2015 Level 69, Equinox Complex Swissôtel The Stamford 2 Stamford Road Singapore 17882 REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-seminar/singapore?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=invite> Join Pivotal at Cloud Native Seminar in Singapore The ability to deliver software has now become a critical requirement for survival in today’s business world.
Companies need to build better software faster to compete. Can your development team move from an idea to production in one motion - in a matter of weeks or days?
Existing monolithic applications, legacy platforms and lengthy operational deployment cycles are holding innovation back. Learn how companies are removing the innovation barrier by moving to a cloud native approach for the software delivery lifecycle.
Join us for a half-day event and learn how companies are deploying software in weeks vs months using a Cloud Native platform. At this event, you will learn:
- What a Cloud Native architecture is and the patterns of high performing organisations that deliver software faster, consistently and reliably at scale. - What Microservices are and how a Microservice Architecture enables speed, safety and scalability - How Continuous Delivery and DevOps drives innovation cycles - How to use a Cloud Native platform to facilitate operational agility - How to modernise the application portfolio
Register <http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-seminar/singapore?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=invite> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. AGENDA
